title: Crashed running hello world.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code fn main(){ println!("Hello, world!"); } ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: rustc 1.64.0 (a55dd71d5 2022-09-19) binary: rustc commit-hash: a55dd71d5fb0ec5a6a3a9e8c27b2127ba491ce52 commit-date: 2022-09-19 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.64.0 LLVM version: 14.0.6 ``` ### Error output r: internal compiler error: unexpected panic error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.64.0 (a55dd71d5 2022-09-19) running on aarch64-apple-darwin query stack during panic: end of query stack DELL@MacBook-Pro lib % ./ma in zsh: no such file or directory: ./main DELL@MacBook-Pro lib % rustc main.rs thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: JoinPathsError { inner: JoinPathsError }', compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/back/linker.rs:123:47 stack backtrace: 0: 0x103c5f978 - ::fmt::h1543c132bc4e188c 1: 0x103cac828 - core::fmt::write::hda8e8eb84b49cbfc 2: 0x103c52c74 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::hb84c8996aec7120c 3: 0x103c625d0 - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::hdf06011cb093de6a 4: 0x103c62334 - std::panicking::default_hook::hd7ceb942fff7b170 5: 0x10b2acd9c - rustc_driver[8f8caae8abf9e6c7]::DEFAULT_HOOK::{closure#0}::{closure#0} 6: 0x103c62ba4 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h053d4067a63a6fcb 7: 0x103c62a3c - std::panicking::begin_panic_handler::{{closure}}::hea9e6c546a23e8ff 8: 0x103c5fe54 - std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_end_short_backtrace::hd64e012cf32134c6 9: 0x103c62794 - _rust_begin_unwind 10: 0x103cd7808 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::hbfde5533e1c0592e 11: 0x103cd78f4 - core::result::unwrap_failed::h68832e989a8867c1 12: 0x10e4b2c3c - rustc_codegen_ssa[fc45fc3b282c156f]::back::linker::get_linker 13: 0x10e4dd5e8 - rustc_codegen_ssa[fc45fc3b282c156f]::back::link::linker_with_args 14: 0x10e4d6c7c - rustc_codegen_ssa[fc45fc3b282c156f]::back::link::link_natively 15: 0x10e4d45e8 - rustc_codegen_ssa[fc45fc3b282c156f]::back::link::link_binary 16: 0x10b4435cc - ::link 17: 0x10b3a9418 - ::link 18: 0x10b297334 - rustc_span[a44dd0315ec95fe3]::with_source_map::, rustc_interface[efe2b5ffa23206d6]::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver[8f8caae8abf9e6c7]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 19: 0x10b24afd0 - >::set::, rustc_driver[8f8caae8abf9e6c7]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[470b050f2b764c47]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[b30f6c19c09b5d30]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 20: 0x10b26a43c - std[dfd41530add96b74]::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::, rustc_driver[8f8caae8abf9e6c7]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[470b050f2b764c47]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[b30f6c19c09b5d30]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}, core[470b050f2b764c47]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[b30f6c19c09b5d30]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 21: 0x10b26aaf8 - <::spawn_unchecked_, rustc_driver[8f8caae8abf9e6c7]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[470b050f2b764c47]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[b30f6c19c09b5d30]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}, core[470b050f2b764c47]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[b30f6c19c09b5d30]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#1} as core[470b050f2b764c47]::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once::{shim:vtable#0} 22: 0x103c6b3dc - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::h403ab16d5f453cd4 23: 0x1bc9f826c - __pthread_deallocate error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
